text: June Gable (born June 5, 1945) is a retired American television, stage, and a movie actress who is known for her role has as Estelle Leonard in the hit- comedy series Friends. She was nominated for a Tony Award.http://www.ibdb.com/awardperson.asp?id=77793 June Gable Awards She was born on June 5, 1945 in New York City, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: June Gable
